'''Karmaphala Wood Liquid Cargo Rack''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Karmaphala Wood Liquid Cargo Rack is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] after defeating an [[Eremite]] camp to the east of [[Wadi Al-Majuj]].
